name: What Remains of Idle Thumbs
description:
What Remains of Idle Thumbs was created in two weeks for Wizard Jam 10, the Idle Thumbs community game jam. Please do check out the other games at: https://itch.io/jam/wizard-jam-10/entries

If you notice any major bugs or issues, feel free to post a comment below.

Known issues

* Restarting the last wave might be broken.
